Name: Scorpion Empire
Description: The Scorpion Empire emerged from the remnants of Clan Goliath Scorpion and absorbed the assets of the shattered Clan Ice Hellion, establishing a new realm built on their shared histories and philosophies. Guided by the Scorpion Imperio, a unique governing body blending Clan traditions with the cultural influences of the Nueva Castile region, the Scorpion Empire seeks a balance between strength and cultural enrichment. Known for their esoteric outlook, the Empire reveres the mythical vision quests central to their Scorpion heritage while extending dominion across systems in the deep periphery.
ReputationStatements: If it were not for the fact that the necrosia has shown me you can be of service, I would not suffer your presence. Here is a trivial task for you, to prove your worth.
Your dishonorable ways are well known to the Scorpion Empire; however, you might yet be of use. Take this batchall and show me that you can serve the Empire.
My Clan has faced you in battle before, and you have proven to be a competent warrior. Take up this batchall, and perhaps we can find common ground.
You remain an unknown to us. Prove your worth on the battlefield through this batchall, and the Scorpion Empire may consider further opportunities for you.
You have assisted the Scorpion Empire in the past, and your efforts have not gone unnoticed. I present you with this batchall as an opportunity to further strengthen our bond.
Hello again, friend of the Scorpion Empire. While our mutual trust grows, we present you with this batchall to confirm your sincerity and commitment.
Greetings, trusted ally. You have proven your value to the Scorpion Empire many times. I have a critical task that I would entrust to no other; perhaps we will even share some necrosia afterward.
MissionSuccessStatements: Well done, Commander. I foresaw your success in this matter and have already transferred your payment as agreed.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: You clearly lacked the strength to complete all objectives; however, your effort is noted. I will provide partial payment for your partial success. Do better next time.
BadFaithFailureStatements: Your weakness is an embarrassment, and you have failed to honor the terms of the batchall in any significant way. You will receive nothing but my disdain.
